stentry.p: Text that is displayed when the user hovers over the component in the user interface.
Text displayed in a distinctive style with the component. Can be used as a dynamic alert by setting Conditions on the Section or Entry.
A string used to sort Folders, Views and Compositions when they are listed for user selection. Sorted in ascending string order.
Messages are not selectable by users and so do not have a Rank.
The precision (length) of the data value. Used to set the size of the input field in the user interface.
